content:
@Frank Bryan, Here is a netCDF file with GLODAPv1 data:
/glade/p/cgd/oce/projects/cesm2-marbl/glodap-data/GLODAPv1/GLODAPv1.nc

Here is the function I used to generate this netCDF file from the txt files:
https://github.com/marbl-ecosys/cesm2-marbl/blob/7c4dcedb0bb4974374e55afb9f24a2b358765dc5/notebooks/glodap.py#L109

FYI, when I originally downloaded GLODAPv1 from CDIAC (which doesn't exist anymore), Bob Key provided netCDF.
I have that output in the directory /glade/p/cesm/bgcwg/GLODAP
Hopefully the contents are the same as the results from Matt's text->netCDF conversion.
I think I may have even checked that! (but can't remember for certain)
